item.title: 【Unreleased/Unofficial (lossless)】Florrie - Trouble in the Making (FLAC/ALAC)
item.description:
The original debut studio album by Florrie, intended for a 2014/2015 release when she was signed to Sony Music. It spawned the singles "Little White Lies", "Too Young to Remember" and "Live a Little", as well as the Sirens EP (2014). An album sampler featuring the first six tracks surfaced online in 2016.

Additionally, "Turn the World Upside Down" was used in a promotional ad but the song was never released. Also, "Looking for Love in the Wrong Place" was reworked and retitled "Looking for Love", included in her debut studio album The Lost Ones (2024).

Tracklist:
  1. Too Young to Remember
  2. Turn the World Upside Down
  3. Galaxies
  4. Looking for Love in the Wrong Place
  5. Little White Lies
  6. Live a Little
  7. Seashells
  8. Free Falling
  9. Wanna Control Myself
  10. Last Thing on Your List
  11. Stupid Boy

DOWNLOAD
